text:
Hello :wave: could someone help on this?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C019VT42R8X/p1704878631703649>

you are going to have to show your code and add some more details to this

I’d also send some of these variables to the output or console log them. There are far too many items by saying “this works locally but not in a workflow” for us to even begin with this.

Often times when people ask questions like this they don’t put enough information for someone to dig into the details, so then it takes a dentist to pull teeth to get the details you want us to look at.

If you think about it — how would anyone know what your issue is, given the amount of information you have provided.

You might not have secrets hooked up, you might not be passing in proper variables, just so many unknowns

In case anyone ever runs into this. The issue is that Vite is compiling my the Vue app and creating a global variable to replace all addEventListener functions. I had to add a line into the build ... rollUptions for format 'iife' which I found here. <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/73713323/how-to-wrap-vite-build-in-iife-and-still-have-all-the-dependencies-bundled-into>
